name: Kiwi Trinity
description:
**This is a strap-on recipe**

Pairings I've tried with this recipe.

Strawberry Ripe TFA @ 5% - Pretty good, the GF loves it. Pretty much makes your standard strawberry kiwi flavor.
Wild Melon FLV @ 2% - Tastes like cloud nerds e liquid kiwi melon flavor. 
Strawberry Ripe TFA @ 5% and Strawberry Taffy CAP @ 2% - Makes for a nice strawberry kiwi taffy flavor.


**small disclaimer, I've ran .25% super sweet with most of these combo's to make them sweet to my liking**
author: Sublimeice
